html:
11.17.20  11:20 pm   In your video hi I'm steve, at the end the guy who is not steve say bye I'm steve which is not his name. Do you have an explanation for this tomfoolery?

      it ends the video in the same way it starts, and, it is a rare chance to hear the famous phrase "hi, i'm ____" in a 'bye' variation, which surprisingly i had never heard even once before making this video

11.17.20  11:16 pm   fav music genre?

      what the heck is a music genre

11.17.20  11:01 pm   i love your videos cause they're pleasing to the eye, cool and your voice is nice, what inspired you to make them this way?

      basically what usually happens is, i get a trillion ideas in my mind of what i WISH it could be like. then i get extremely disappointed to realize that none of those ways are actually possible for me to do. then, sometimes, i am able to find 1 way that is just barely possible. and i settle for doing it that way

11.17.20  10:59 pm   hey so any advice on how to be productive 

      what would you like to produce

11.17.20  10:53 pm   are you insane or a creative genius

      i am what is known as 'the norm'

11.17.20  10:33 pm   do you have writers block or some thing,

     no, actually i have the opposite problem, i write too fast and so the production will never ever be able to keep up

      any way we are waiting for you to show up again and we are there with you  all the way

11.17.20  10:01 pm   How do you come up with great ideas. Not anything specific just ideas

      just get out there and start moving molecules around. or, try to keep them in the same place and watch them break free

11.17.20  9:45 pm   Do you think life has a meaning?

      way more than 1

11.17.20  9:04 pm   have you written anything in locrian?

      yes. 'at the airport terminal' is in E locrian

11.17.20  8:41 pm   Where did all the good times go?

      all around you, right now. that's where they went

11.17.20  8:29 pm   love your music Bill

      i'm going to make it better

11.17.20  8:24 pm   How often should I replace my hamster?

      about once per hamster

11.17.20  8:23 pm   how can i make a piece of work that has a positive (good) impact on the world

      if that's what you want, that's what will happen. some people may feel the impact more in the 2nd piece of work, some people may feel it more in the 8th. do all 10, and the impact will be felt somewhere

11.17.20  8:13 pm   How to sing good?

      do it for fun

11.17.20  7:51 pm   How are you so talented ?

      i never figured out how to touch my own elbow. so needless to say i had to fill that time with other things

11.17.20  7:44 pm   Your videos, manner of speaking (both in and out of song) as well as your answers to these questions all give the distinct impression you are a time traveler, or have seen the future, or have seen your death, etc.. the question is, are you a time traveler?

      time is actually required, for travel

11.17.20  7:16 pm   Do you find your old videos are cringy?

      yes, and the new ones as well. unless i am in the mood to be a little more.... 'accepting'

11.17.20  7:08 pm   How to think better?

      move around

11.17.20  6:14 pm   Are u secretly a potato

      i either don't know or can't tell you

11.17.20  6:07 pm   You say in a video that everything is stupid. So, are you nihilist ?

      fiction writer

11.17.20  5:22 pm   Your videos are very good and you seem like a nice person. What is your opinion on grapefruits? 

      is it a fruit? is it a grape? these are things i would need to know before i make my opinoin

11.17.20  5:14 pm   How do I focus?

      on what

11.17.20  5:09 pm   whats your favourite planet

      the one with all the dRaMa

11.17.20  4:53 pm   If you can make an upload schedule and be able to follow it what will it be?

      1 video every 1 to 3 weeks

11.17.20  4:33 pm   How long is the video you're working on?

      4 minutes and 10 seconds

11.17.20  4:31 pm   will you ever try producing lizard music in the future? Or snake, I'm not picky.

      i have done lizard music before

11.17.20  3:37 pm   What was the bad thing you did?

      underestimated how great the great plains are

11.17.20  3:30 pm   Could you say that life is a simple bundle of events in one's existence? Or is it more than that.

      sometimes it's a complicated bundle of events

11.17.20  2:38 pm   Do you ever do things that are completely unrelated to music?

      occasionally

11.17.20  2:13 pm   What do you like to do when you're not making videos?

      make songs,

11.17.20  2:08 pm   How do you find motivation for hard or tedious tasks? 

      first check what the task is

11.17.20  1:46 pm   Why do your songs predict the future

      everything predicts the future. everything will happen eventually

11.17.20  1:33 pm   How do you have the answer to anything?

      sometimes i have to make my own answers

11.17.20  1:03 pm   do you like christmas music?

      yes

11.17.20  12:19 pm   every time I try to write a song, it ends up sounding the same as all the other songs I've made. any tips on how to remedy this?

      this is just an experiment, but try to write something that's not a song. it will become a song anyway, and the pathway back should be unique

11.17.20  12:12 pm   What inspired you to do what you do

      just trying to get by

11.17.20  11:53 am   How do you come up with the lyrics?

      musically

11.17.20  11:52 am   What are the different types of news media?

      emo, aggro, lofi, minimalist,

11.17.20  11:42 am   Hi bill do you like art?

      it likes me. but, that's its job

11.17.20  11:28 am    do you think that I would be possible to play "the moon is made of cheese, but I can't taste it" on the cello? 

      that song probably relies heavily on chords. and chords are gonna want to be around the middle c range. so if the cello can do that, while taking care of the melody (maybe you'd sing it), then you'd be all set

11.17.20  11:16 am   What kind of fruit would you be if you were a fruit?

      that's none of my business. this whole thing was your idea

11.17.20  10:49 am   how to do a music?

      how about using a litle reverse psychology

11.17.20  10:29 am   Chords to "might quit"?

     approximately
      E
      G#-7
      Asus2
      C#-7 B7sus4 B7sus4
     E
     G#-7
     Asus2         B7sus4 B7sus4
     E

11.17.20  10:15 am   in your songvideos, do you record all the footage on the same day or over multiple days? 

      i have a new company policy which says it should be 1 day, anything more is considered squanderative

11.17.20  9:48 am   What happens down in Congress?

      2 teams vote the hell out of each other, in formal attire

11.17.20  9:39 am   Hey Bill how do you handle writers block

      this may sound absurd, but, how about writing something

11.17.20  9:36 am   Hi Bill

How are you ?

And are the graphical reinventions you've been working on turning out how you want so far?

      so far, they've fallen about 99.9% short of what i wantED. which is exactly what made me realize how desperately i want the .1% that remains, if it's all i can get

11.17.20  9:20 am   will you make more videos in the future

      yes

11.17.20  8:58 am   Any advice on how to focus better? This ask is kind of ironic because I'm writing it in the middle of math class -

      step 1 is to identify what the thing is that you would like to focus on. this may seem simple, but i don't feel like you've done that so far, or at least if you did you didn't tell me about it

11.17.20  8:55 am   do you write chords or melody first

      melody, but, the melody usually comes with chord residue already baked in. just need to pop it in the microwave
